Buckhorn Lake: Check Out the High Tech Aqua Vu Cam

06 Jun 2012


Buckhorn Lake in the heart of the Kawarthas is famous for its fishing. The video below makes it pretty clear why that is. If you’re looking for Buckhorn Fishing Adventures, here are a few spots you need to check out

Al’s Adventures Inc.  “Keep to date with Als Adventures and see all the great fishing charters and adventures”

Kawartha King Muskie Charters “Creating Great Memories”

Mike Williams, Professional Fisherman Kawartha Lakes Guiding Service  705-657-3684 or 705-657-3260

And now, without further ado, the Aqua Vu Cam:
